title: The Making of a story: television news
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Compilation tape: 1.”The Making of a Story”. A documentary of how a story is evolved through the process of becoming television for the public. 2. “Television news”. A panel of four, representing professionals from the television networks, news departments as well as researches and academics, give some frameworks for those interested in studying television news. No other credits available.
